name: Bullet Purgatory (ApeHardware)
description:
An old project I made in Game Maker some years ago, salvaged and made slightly less horrific.

Bullet Purgatory is a strange yet fun mix between a bullet hell and a fighting game where things can get so crazy that button massing can be a viable tactic, featuring 18 bizarre characters, each one with their own bullet hell attacks.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys : move character
  • Z : main attack 1
  • X : main attack 2
  • C : cheat attack
  • Space : special attack
  • Esc : close game
  • P : pause game
